body.name: Mini Projector, 2023 Upgraded CiBest 1080P Full HD Portable Projector, 12000L Outdoor Projector for Home Theater Movie Projector, Projector 4K Compatible with HDMI, VGA, USB, TV Stick, Laptop
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 16 mins
features: 【OPTIMAL VISUAL PERFORMANCE】Experience enhanced visuals with the 2023 CiBest mini projector, offering 90% greater brightness compared to other portable projectors. With Native 1080P Full HD and 10000:1 contrast ratio, this 4K projector delivers astonishingly realistic images for movies and videos. The home projector's diffuse reflection technology ensures a gentle projection image that protects your eyes.

【EXTENSIVE DEVICE COMPATIBILITY】Our versatile outdoor projector supports a broad range of devices, including TV sticks, PCs, laptops, tablets, Blue-ray DVD players, USB drives, gaming consoles (PS4/XBOX/WII), media players (music, pictures, video, TXT), and headphones. Easily connect your iPad, iPhone, or Android smartphone with an extra HDMI adapter (not included). Not suitable for PPT business presentations.

【IMMERSIVE VIEWING & POWERFUL AUDIO】The mini projector's large viewing experience ranges from 30" to 200" with an ideal image size of 60 - 80". The built-in stereo speakers deliver impressive sound effects, or connect to your surround sound system via the 3.5mm audio output for an even better audio experience.

【LIGHTWEIGHT & QUIET OPERATION】This portable projector boasts a compact size of 6 x 4.5 x 2.5 inches and a weight of 2.2 lbs, perfect for on-the-go use. The latest cooling system of the projectors 4K reduces fan noise by 50%, providing a quieter environment for movie enjoyment. Additionally, it offers ±15° manual keystone correction to cater to various requirements.

【5-YEAR DEPENDABLE WARRANTY】Buy with confidence! We offer a 5-year return policy and lifetime repair warranty for our mini portable projectors. Our committed customer support team is always available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 270 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, happy with the purchase
reviews.reviewText: I really like this projector, its size, and the easy set up. The image quality is great and I’m very pleased. Two things to consider is the cord of the projector might be too short so consider buying an extension. Also, the projector has a humming sound but nothing that is bothersome or gets in the way of the movie audio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: it was very straightforward with using and works well! obviously the image is a little blurry but that’s just the projector being a projector and it may be better if you have a white sheet. i loved how big it was shown, i wasn’t expecting the image to come out that big so that was nice! overall, it’s good for the price & does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This mini projector is the best for the price! It projects really nice. The video quality is good, no glitching nor blurry. The volume is decent and you are able to control it with the remote control it comes with. It also comes with a tripod in case you need it to be a bit more higher. I’d buy another one in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great when environment is dark
reviews.reviewText: Good projector, good sound. Brightness is good when room is dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was exactly what I was looking for and more!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a projector for teaching music to small children. Not only is it just what it says it is. But its portable nature makes it so easy to take anywhere! The picture is perfect! It’s so easy to connect to my computer and came with everything I needed! I would buy again and recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked very well! Family movie nights are so much better with this thing! We can use it in any room and it is so easy to set up, just plug in your fire stick and you’re good to go! I can’t wait for the summer movie nights outside. Also the sound is pretty good considering the size of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking around for projector as a gift for my sister who wanted one for art to project digital photos onto the canvas but many of them were expensive for what you get or low quality and outdated in today's technology. I eventually found this one and ordered it right away. My sister loved it. She connected a chromecast onto and can cast anything from her phone to it.Things I like about it:-Native 1080p (some companies list projector as 1080p supported meaning that it can take 1080p input but won't output at 1080p)-Comes with a tripod. I don't use it because it's small as you can see in the top left corner of the pictures I included. I used an old camera tripod and it was compatible with the mount.-includes two cables, HDMI & RCA cable- has cleaning utensils- a remote ( i forgot to include it in the photos but there is one included n-Has a HDMI port, USB port, av port, and a Headphone 3.5m AUX port

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Variety of input options. Perfect projector for art sketching.
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace an old projector my wife had for art sketching. You would have to put a photo in and it would project horizontally on the wall. Problem is the room needed to be dark and she had to draw in an uncomfortable position with her canvas or sketchpad taped to the wall. It's bright enough that she can sketch and paint at the dining table on a sunny day. The tripod mount on this is a huge bonus and you can flip the image around to project down to a table surface. The input options allow you to connect your laptop via HDMI. The USB input lets her put photos on a USB stick to project. I believe you can connect your Amazon firestick to it to watch movies theatre style projecting to a portable screen or a big white wall though I haven't tried that yet. So far we are very happy with this projector.
Tiene una muy buena calidad de imagen y audio por su precio, incluye su tripié y control, se siente de buena calidad
